titleStmt.title: A theological systeme upon the presupposition, that men were before Adam the first part.
Systerna theologicum ex praeadamitarum hypothesi. English
titleStmt.author: La Peyrère, Isaac de, 1594-1676.

titleStmt.title: A theological systeme upon the presupposition, that men were before Adam the first part.
Systerna theologicum ex praeadamitarum hypothesi. English
titleStmt.author: La Peyrère, Isaac de, 1594-1676.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Isaac de La Peyère. cf. NUC pre-1956.
This item can also be found with "Men before Adam" (Wing 427) at reel 845:13.
Formerly identified as Wing L428 (number cancelled); Wing (2nd ed., 1994) identifies this item as part of L427.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
